DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety Betamethasone Microsphere ( DE-102 ) macular edema follow branch retinal vein occlusion
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Betamethasone Microsphere Patients With Macular Edema Following Branch Retinal Vein Occlusion ( HIKARI )
DOC.criteria: 20 year age old Diagnosis macular edema follow branch retinal vein occlusion BCVA ETDRS letter score nonstudy eye < 35 Known steroidresponder
